description: Mr Nice Guy has been Topeka’s Cheesesteak Wiz since 2012 when he began serving the authentic flavors of the east: Original Philly Steak, Cheese Whiz, and delicious grilled veggies (onions, bell peppers, mushrooms). He’s also servin’ up other great comfort cravings: Frito Pies, Jumbo Hot Dogs, Juicy Cheeseburgers, and Pulled Pork Sandwiches with scrumptious plump pork that’s been smoked for 15 hours; the perfect amount of time to soak in so much wonderful flavor. So if you’re jonesing for the best Cheesesteak of your life, you just gotta make your way over to Mr Nice Guys’ Hot Box for a meaty and cheesy experience that totally rocks.
name: Mr. Nice Guy's Hot Box
